addons.name: Buster: Captcha Solver for Humans
addons.description: Save time by asking Buster to solve captchas for you.
addons.fullDescription:
Buster is a Firefox extension which helps you to solve difficult captchas by completing reCAPTCHA audio challenges using speech recognition. Challenges are solved by clicking on the extension button at the bottom of the reCAPTCHA widget.

It is not guaranteed that challenges are always solved, the limitations of the technology need to be considered.

The continued development of Buster is made possible thanks to the support of awesome backers. If you'd like to join them, please consider contributing with Patreon, PayPal or Bitcoin.

User input simulation

User input simulation can be enabled from the extension's options, and requires the installation of a client app, which enables Buster to send native user input to the browser and helps improve the success rate of the extension and lower the occurrence of temporary blocks.

Follow the instructions to download and install the client app on Windows, Linux and macOS after enabling the feature, or get the app from the Buster Client repository.

Solving more than a couple of reCAPTCHA challenges a day may lead to a temporary block regardless of using the extension.

Anti-fingerprinting prevents the client app from working as expected, visit the about:config page to make sure privacy.resistFingerprinting is set to false.

Motivation

reCAPTCHA challenges remain a considerable burden on the web, delaying and often blocking our access to services and information depending on our physical and cognitive abilities, our social and cultural background, and the devices or networks we connect from.

The difficulty of captchas can be so out of balance, that sometimes they seem friendlier to bots than they are to humans.

The goal of this project is to improve our experience with captchas, by giving us easy access to solutions already utilized by automated systems.

Required permissions:

    Access your data for all websites: required for accessing challenges
    Exchange messages with programs other than Firefox: needed for interacting with the client app when user input simulation in enabled
    Display notifications: used for displaying error messages
    Access browser activity during navigation: needed for resetting challenges



The extension is also available for Chrome and Opera.


Reviews are not monitored for bug reports, please use GitHub for issues and feature requests.
https://github.com/dessant/buster

addons.name: I'm not robot captcha clicker
addons.description:
I'm not robot captcha automatic clicker.
If such a form is presented, it automatically clicks it saving your precious 5-7 seconds.
addons.fullDescription:
This is useful especially for the web masters. For example when using Google Webmasters etc.

Just install this and go to any site which asks you to click: "I'm not a robot".

It will click it as soon as page DOM is ready.

For suggestions please email me at : contactus[@] prowebmastersindia.com
